name: NSSlider.TickMarkPosition
desc: The position where a linear sliderâ€™s tick marks appear (above, below, leading, or trailing).

items.name: case below
items.desc: A constant indicating that tick marks are displayed below the slider.

items.name: case above
items.desc: A constant indicating that tick marks are displayed above the slider.

items.name: static var leading: NSSlider.TickMarkPosition
items.desc: A constant indicating that tick marks are displayed on the leading side of the slider.

items.name: static var trailing: NSSlider.TickMarkPosition
items.desc: A constant indicating that tick marks are displayed on the trailing side of the slider.
